snippet: The senior forwards Zack Novak of Michigan and Draymond Green of Michigan State, who led their teams to shares of the regular-season title, now enter the conference tournament.
abstract: Michigan forward Zack Novak and Michigan State forward Draymond Green, who led their teams to shares of the regular-season title, are preparing or the Big Ten Conference tournament.
lead_paragraph: The senior forwards Zack Novak of Michigan and Draymond Green of Michigan State, who led their teams to shares of the regular-season title, now enter the conference tournament.

headline.seo: Big Ten Tournament: In Zack Novak and Draymond Green, Lots of Similarities
headline.main: Plenty of Parallels for Forwards in Their Final Big Ten Tournament
headline.print_headline: Plenty of Parallels for Senior Forwards in Big Ten
